languages.text: "Безмолвный приговор" — орудие смерти, что даровано тебе волей Неумирающего. Кибелла — имя той, кому суждено стать твоим щитом и тенью. Души предателей — дар, что через Завет Паутины будет очищен для Него".

"We give you a blade — the Silent Verdict. The Undying One has chosen you to wield this instrument of death. We give you one of our own — Kibellah. She will be your shield and shadow. And we give you the blood of these traitors — the Tenets of the Web will purify their souls."
languages.original_text: "Безмолвный приговор" — орудие смерти, что даровано тебе волей Неумирающего. Кибелла — имя той, кому суждено стать твоим щитом и тенью. Души предателей — дар, что через Завет Паутины будет очищен для Него".

traits.locale_text: "Silent Verdict is an instrument of death given to you at the Undying One's bidding. Kibellah is the name of her who is destined to be your shield and your shadow. The souls of the traitors are a gift that will be purified for Him through Ahn'shini."

"Silent Verdict is an instrument of death given to you at the Undying One's bidding. Kibellah is the name of her who is destined to be your shield and your shadow. The souls of the traitors are a gift that will be purified for Him through Ahn'shini."

"We give you a blade — the Silent Verdict. The Undying One has chosen you to wield this instrument of death. We give you one of our own — Kibellah. She will be your shield and shadow. And we give you the blood of these traitors — the way of Ahn'shini will purify their souls."

"We give you a blade — the Silent Verdict. The Undying One has chosen you to wield this instrument of death. We give you one of our own — Kibellah. She will be your shield and shadow. And we give you the blood of these traitors — the way of Ahn'shini will purify their souls."

"We give you a blade — the Silent Verdict. The Undying One has chosen you to wield this instrument of death. We give you one of our own — Kibellah. She will be your shield and shadow. And we give you the blood of these traitors — the Tenets of the Web will purify their souls."

"We give you a blade — the Silent Verdict. The Undying One has chosen you to wield this instrument of death. We give you one of our own — Kibellah. She will be your shield and shadow. And we give you the blood of these traitors — the Tenets of the Web will purify their souls."

languages.text: « Nous vous donnons une épée, appelée Verdict silencieux. L'Immortel vous a {mf|choisi|choisie} pour manier cet instrument de mort. Nous vous donnons l'une des nôtres, Kibellah. Elle sera votre bouclier et votre ombre. Et nous vous donnons le sang des traîtres. Que leur âme soit purifiée par les Préceptes de la Toile. »
languages.original_text: "We give you a blade — the Silent Verdict. The Undying One has chosen you to wield this instrument of death. We give you one of our own — Kibellah. She will be your shield and shadow. And we give you the blood of these traitors — the Tenets of the Web will purify their souls."

traits.locale_text: « Nous vous donnons une épée, appelée Verdict silencieux. L'Immortel vous a {mf|choisi|choisie} pour manier cet instrument de mort. Nous vous donnons l'une des nôtres, Kibellah. Elle sera votre bouclier et votre ombre. Et nous vous donnons le sang des traîtres. Que leur âme soit purifiée par les Préceptes de la Toile. »

languages.text: «Le otorgamos un arma: el Veredicto Silencioso. El Inmortal l{mf|e|a} ha elegido para blandir este instrumento de la muerte. Le otorgamos a una de los nuestros: Kibellah. Será su escudo y su sombra. Y le otorgamos la sangre de estos traidores: la Doctrina de la Red purificará sus almas».
languages.original_text: "We give you a blade — the Silent Verdict. The Undying One has chosen you to wield this instrument of death. We give you one of our own — Kibellah. She will be your shield and shadow. And we give you the blood of these traitors — the Tenets of the Web will purify their souls."

traits.locale_text: «Le otorgamos un arma: el Veredicto Silencioso. El Inmortal l{mf|e|a} ha elegido para blandir este instrumento de la muerte. Le otorgamos a una de los nuestros: Kibellah. Será su escudo y su sombra. Y le otorgamos la sangre de estos traidores: la Doctrina de la Red purificará sus almas».

languages.text: “我们献给你一把利刃——无声裁决。不死之神选中了你，让你使用这件工具挥洒死亡。我们献给你我们之中的一位成员——绮贝菈。她将会成为你的盾牌，你的影子。此外，我们献给你这些叛徒的鲜血，愿织血罗网的教义净化他们的灵魂。”
languages.original_text: "We give you a blade — the Silent Verdict. The Undying One has chosen you to wield this instrument of death. We give you one of our own — Kibellah. She will be your shield and shadow. And we give you the blood of these traitors — the Tenets of the Web will purify their souls."

traits.locale_text: “我们献给你一把利刃——无声裁决。不死之神选中了你，让你使用这件工具挥洒死亡。我们献给你我们之中的一位成员——绮贝菈。她将会成为你的盾牌，你的影子。此外，我们献给你这些叛徒的鲜血，愿织血罗网的教义净化他们的灵魂。”

languages.text: 「お前に刃を授ける…沈黙の評決だ。不死の者が、この死の道具を振る者としてお前を選んだ。我らの一人であるキベラを与えよう。彼女はお前の盾となり、影となる。そして裏切り者たちの血を与えよう。ウェブの教義が彼らの魂を浄化するだろう」
languages.original_text: "We give you a blade — the Silent Verdict. The Undying One has chosen you to wield this instrument of death. We give you one of our own — Kibellah. She will be your shield and shadow. And we give you the blood of these traitors — the Tenets of the Web will purify their souls."

traits.locale_text: 「お前に刃を授ける…沈黙の評決だ。不死の者が、この死の道具を振る者としてお前を選んだ。我らの一人であるキベラを与えよう。彼女はお前の盾となり、影となる。そして裏切り者たちの血を与えよう。ウェブの教義が彼らの魂を浄化するだろう」

languages.text: "Wir geben Euch eine Klinge — das Stumme Urteil. Der Todlose hat Euch auserwählt, dieses Instrument des Todes zu führen. Wir geben Euch eine der Unseren — Kibellah. Sie wird Euer Schild und Euer Schatten sein. Und wir geben Euch das Blut dieser Verräter ... die Grundsätze werden ihre Seelen läutern."
languages.original_text: "We give you a blade — the Silent Verdict. The Undying One has chosen you to wield this instrument of death. We give you one of our own — Kibellah. She will be your shield and shadow. And we give you the blood of these traitors — the Tenets of the Web will purify their souls."

traits.locale_text: "Wir geben Euch eine Klinge — das Stumme Urteil. Der Todlose hat Euch auserwählt, dieses Instrument des Todes zu führen. Wir geben Euch eine der Unseren — Kibellah. Sie wird Euer Schild und Euer Schatten sein. Und wir geben Euch das Blut dieser Verräter ... die Grundsätze werden ihre Seelen läutern."

languages.original_text: "We give you a blade — the Silent Verdict. The Undying One has chosen you to wield this instrument of death. We give you one of our own — Kibellah. She will be your shield and shadow. And we give you the blood of these traitors — the Tenets of the Web will purify their souls."

languages.text: "Bu bıçak armağanımızdır... Adı da Sessiz Hüküm. Ölmeyen, bu ölüm aracını kullanacak kişi olarak seni seçmiş. Sana kendi canımızdan bir armağanımız da var... Kibellah. Sana hem kalkan hem de gölge olacak. Ayrıca bu hainlerin kanını da armağan ediyoruz... Ağ'ın İlkeleri, ruhlarını arındıracak."
languages.original_text: "We give you a blade — the Silent Verdict. The Undying One has chosen you to wield this instrument of death. We give you one of our own — Kibellah. She will be your shield and shadow. And we give you the blood of these traitors — the Tenets of the Web will purify their souls."
